metadata.title: CVE-2021-39114 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Affected versions of Atlassian Confluence Server and Data Center allowusers with a valid account on a Confluence Data Center instance to executearbitrary Java code or run arbitrary system commands by injecting an OGNLpayload. The affected versions are before version 6.13.23, from version6.14.0 before 7.4.11, from version 7.5.0 before 7.11.6, and from version7.12.0 before 7.12.5.

criterions.comment: confluence: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
